body.raw:
![dormify](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/cover.png)

![home-page](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/home-page2.png)

![sign-up](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/sign-up.png)

![validate-invitation](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/validate-invitation.png)

- Carrying out team coordination and work
- Meeting with dormitory managers for requirements engineering and data gathering.
- We hold scrum meeting (planning, daily ...) in Microsoft Teams during COVID19 pandemic
- We designed and developed a software for managing dormitory stuffs like ticketing, issue tracking, guest invitation
- We designed fully dockerized and automated CI/CD during development of software

#### Description of CI/CD

our project contains two packages. One package called common that contains reusable components
and utilities and main package called student-panel.
I designed a pipeline that contains of 3 stage:

- build
- type-coverage (using [type-coverage package](https://github.com/plantain-00/type-coverage))
- test (unit testing with Jest and e2e testing with Cypress)

After each build we collect artifacts containing build output, test result and coverage,
Cypress videos and screenshots and type-coverage results.

#### Some screenshots form CI/CD:

#### Pipelines

![pipelines](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/pipelines.png)

![pipeline-result](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/pipeline-result.png)

#### Coverage results

![coverage-results](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/coverage-results.png)

#### Deployment

![deployment](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/deployment.png)

#### Artifacts

![artifacts](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/artifacts.png)

#### Cypress video output

![cypress-video-output](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/cypress-video-output.png)

#### Azure feed (private npm registry)

![azure-feed](/images/_markdowns/projects/dormify/feeds.png)

• Carrying out team coordination and work

  • We hold scrum meeting (planning, daily ...) in Microsoft Teams during COVID19 pandemic
  • We designed and developed a software for managing dormitory stuffs like ticketing, issue tracking, guest invitation
  • We designed fully dockerized and automated CI/CD during development of software

Description of CI/CD

our project contains two packages. One package called common that contains reusable components and utilities and main package called student-panel. I designed a pipeline that contains of 3 stage:

  • build
  • type-coverage (using type-coverage package)
  • test (unit testing with Jest and e2e testing with Cypress)

After each build we collect artifacts containing build output, test result and coverage, Cypress videos and screenshots and type-coverage results.
